column5: Last product review proved to be popular so I am at it again Review of my Bass Pro Shops Pro Qualifier rain suit - as mentioned before I have no affiliation with BPS or any of the brands or outfits I discuss on the website (open to it, sure lol) If I had to pick the 3 most asked about gear items for fishing trips its rain suit, fish finder and two piece or one piece rods Latest post is up Â– thanks in advancehttps://www.northernjacks.com/post/g...fier-rain-suit Andrew
Better than asking them for sure.
